comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Levy-Lawson,_1st_Viscount_Bur... Succeeded to the barony in January 1916 on the death of his father. He also succeeded his father in the management and ownership of the Daily Telegraph.

comment._content: Thank you swanq. We'll fill in a bit more information about Sir Harry the next time we update the record.
